STATE OF MICHIGAN
GRETCHEN WHITMER DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES ROBERT GORDON
GOVERNOR DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING DIRECTOR
October 28, 2020
Michelle Horn
Midland County Juvenile Care Center
3712 E Ashman St
Midland, MI 48642
RE: License #: CO560201303
Midland County Juvenile Care Center
3712 E Ashman St
Midland, MI 48642
Dear Ms. Horn:
This letter is a follow-up to the Department’s findings regarding the interim inspection
conducted at your facility on 10/27/2020. The purpose of this inspection was to determine
compliance with applicable licensing statutes and administrative rules for Court Operated
Residential Care Facility.
Your facility was found to be in compliance with the requirements of Act No. 218 of the
Public Acts of 1979, as amended, Act No. 258 of the Public Acts of 1974, as amended,
and the applicable Administrative Rules.
The Department provides technical assistance to meet the licensing requirements and
consultation to improve services.
Please contact me with any questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need
to speak to someone immediately, please contact the local office at (248) 975-5053.
Sincerely,
________________________________
Mark R. Hunter, Licensing Consultant Linda Tansil – Area Manager
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
411 Genesee
P.O. Box 5070
Saginaw, MI 48605
(989) 395-2847
611 W. OTTAWA  P.O. BOX 30664  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov/lara  517-335-1980
